original_title: 8カ国語ペラペラなIQ282某有名国立大学在籍の中国人留学生、電撃AVデビュー！！ ウェン・チャオ
overview: Wen Chao is 19 years old. A talented woman who can learn the language of the country she has sex with is studying chemistry at a Japanese university. She said that sex brings out the national character, and she said, "I've had sex with men from various countries, but I like Japanese sex the most." A Chinese who is shy like a Japanese and sexually greedy like a Westerner makes her debut. This neck and buttocks are definitely not Japanese.
title: A Chinese Exchange Student at This Famous National University Who Speaks 8 Languages and Has an IQ of 282 Is Making Her Shocking AV Debut!! Chao Wen
